feed.title: GitHub Julia Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Julia in GitHub

entry.title: itsdfish/SSMPlots.jl
entry.summary: A Julia package for plotting sequential sampling models

entry.title: biaslab/RxInfer.jl
entry.summary: Julia package for automated Bayesian inference on a factor graph with reactive message passing

entry.title: ThummeTo/FMIFlux.jl
entry.summary: FMIFlux.jl is a free-to-use software library for the Julia programming language, which offers the ability to set up NeuralFMUs just like NeuralODEs: You can place FMUs (fmi-standard.org) simply inside any feed-forward ANN topology and keep the resulting hybrid model trainable with a standard (or custom) FluxML training process.
